q: A few players even hit the waves such as Denver Broncos receiver Brandon Lloyd . But Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick wasn't getting anywhere near a surfboard. "I don't surf," Michael Vick said. I watch National Geographic too much, and I've seen too many catastrophic situations. Mike Missanelli reminded Michael Vick that DeSean Jackson made some comments about the quarterback's game-ending interception against the Packers. What's the story with DeSean Jackson ? asked Mike Missanelli "Is he just a young pup who talks out of turn every now and then and you're the wily veteran now, and you have to kinda hit the pup on the nose?"

With a few classic tracks re-recorded and brand new bangers, the album will give listeners a "Then and Now" perspective of our career, states Vin Rock.
